needs: Seeks part‑time (20h/wk) program leadership roles to establish MEAL frameworks, instrument measurable outcomes, and scale effective interventions while upholding governance and auditability for donors. Constraints include limited weekly hours, managing defined budgets, and delivering rapid, measurable gains via small probes, clear SLOs, and stakeholder alignment within the first 90 days.
personality: Analytical, systems‑oriented leader who prioritizes ownership, evidence, and inclusion. Communicates with concise narrative docs, decision logs and short demos, mentors through pairing, and prefers experiments and small probes over debate. Values readable artifacts, humane processes, transparent trade‑offs, and surfacing unknowns early to enable disciplined iteration and accountable team outcomes.
